entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C

Dewpoint: -1.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
